title: Howcome tyler 1s unban is an exception to riots *we don't unban accounts* policy
body: I mean lets be real he's been toxic and deserves permabans if being reformed can ideally get your account reviewed howcome riot doesn't make this exception applied to all accounts????

replies.body: Because his accounts arenâ€™t getting unbanned. They are lifting the ban on tyler1 him self
Just like how they lifted the permaban on Jensen a.k.a Incarnati0n.

sure it's different in terms of technicality. but it's still them lifting a ban. they're lifting a much worse kind of ban. so why shouldn't the average player have a chance at getting a ban lifted after x amount of time and showing reform? especially how easily riot throws out bans these days...
His accounts is still banned. He himself is getting the unban, not his accounts. Dont hold your breath on getting your account back.
I can read, what i didnt read was you edited your message.
that message is 4 days old??? you commented 2 days ago....

its not an account ban its a player ban thats why
his accounts are staying banned but he is free to make new accounts

he is being unplayer banned not account unbanned hope this clears it up for you
They're not unbanning his accounts. They are lifting his indefinite ban on his name. f word
